Detect and prevent fraud in your website: 通过Greip的防止欺诈API检测和预防您的网站或应用程序中的欺诈。 保护您的业务免受经济损失，并更好地了解您的用户。
\nTo get your API Key:\n\n1. Go to your:
To get your API Key:

1. Go to your Greip account dashboard
2. Navigate to API settings
3. Copy your API key
4. Paste it here
Look up details of an Autonomous System: 查找自治系统编号 (ASN) 的详细信息
Look up details of a Bank Identification: 查找银行身份号码(BIN)或发行者身份号码(IIN)
Look up comprehensive information about: 查找有关IP地址的全面信息，包括位置、ISP、安全和风险因素
Validate email addresses by checking dom: 通过检查域有效性、检测可处理的电子邮件以及评估风险因素来验证电子邮件地址
Detect offensive or inappropriate langua: 使用机器学习检测文本中的冒犯性或不恰当语言
Validate phone numbers by checking synta: 通过检查语法和评估有效性及操作状态来验证电话号码
The AS Number to lookup (e.g., AS6167 or: 要查找的 AS 编号(例如AS6167 或 6167)
Environment mode for testing or producti: 测试或生产的环境模式
Function name for JSONP response format: JSONP 响应格式的函数名称
The BIN/IIN of the card (minimum 6 digit: 卡片的BIN/IIN (至少 6 位数字)，可以部分类似于"456789" 或完整卡号
Identify requests from specific users fo: 识别来自特定用户的监测请求(例如电子邮件、电话、用户ID)
The IP address to lookup (IPv4 or IPv6): 要查找的 IP 地址 (IPv4 或 IPv6)
Comma-separated list of modules to inclu: 以逗号分隔的模块列表包括：安全、货币、时区、位置（如“security,timezone,currency”）
The email address to validate: 要验证的电子邮件地址
Return only the score and safety status: 仅返回得分和安全状态
Include a list of bad words found in the: 在文本中包含错误单词列表
ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., U: ISO 3166-1 甲型-2国家代码（例如美国、GB、FR）
Spam Email Detected: 检测到垃圾邮件电子邮件
Spam Phone Number Detected: 检测到垃圾邮件电话号码
Triggers when a new proxy connection is: 检测到新代理连接时触发
Triggers when a new fraudulent payment i: Greip 检测到新的欺诈性付款时触发
Triggers when Greip detects profanity in: 当Greip 检测到特定文本中的亵渎性时触发
Triggers when a new email is marked as S: 当新邮件被Greip 标记为 SPAM时触发
Triggers when a new phone number is mark: 当一个新的电话号码被Greip 标记为 SPAM时触发
\nTo use this trigger, you need to manua:
To use this trigger, you need to manually set up a webhook in your Greip account:

1. Login to your Greip dashboard.
2. Go to Settings > Integrations > Webhooks.
3. Click on "Add Webhook" or "Create New Webhook".
4. Add the following URL in the **Webhook URL** field:
```text
{{webhookUrl}}
```
5. Select **proxy_detected** from the event types.
6. Click Save to create the webhook.

**Note:** Webhooks are only available for paid subscriptions.
